keyMoments.title: Baroque Works Sabotages the Giants' Duel
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek, agents of Baroque Works, execute a plan to eliminate the giants and Straw Hat Pirates by sabotaging Dorry's rum with explosives.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Baroque Works' cunning tactics and willingness to use underhanded methods to eliminate threats to their operations.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3's Scheme Revealed
keyMoments.description: The audience learns that Baroque Works agents Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek are behind the sabotage of the sacred duel.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the upcoming confrontation between the Straw Hat Pirates and Baroque Works agents on Little Garden.
